title: Spack fails to create hardlink views due to Python

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I'm trying to create a hardlink view for python, however the `spack view` command fails.

```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace view hard python python/r2nkythd
...
FileNotFoundError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/mnt/store/tmp/spack/views/python/bin/python3.7' -> 'python/bin/python3'
```

The command fails with non-zero exit code. The command works if creating softlinks instead of hardlinks.

The file `/mnt/store/tmp/spack/views/python/bin/python3.7` does indeed not exist, although I note that `/mnt/store/tmp/spack/views/python/bin/python3.7m` _does_ exist.
